original_text: The horses will run along all the streets. The soldiers will kill your people with their swords. The strong pillars of your buildings will fall to the ground.
korean_text: 그가 그 말굽으로 네 모든 거리를 밟을 것이며 칼로 네 백성을 죽일 것이며 네 견고한 석상을 땅에 엎드러뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: The horses will run along all the streets.
sentences.korean_translation: 말들이 모든 거리를 따라 달릴 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The soldiers will kill your people
The strong pillars of your buildings
